citations.narrative:
No additional perimeter fencing has been added since the last inspection of the fencing. The facility has hired a fencer to
do the work but it has not yet been completed. The current enclosure housing the two coatimundi is composed of chain
link panels on all four sides, top and bottom. It is not enclosed by a perimeter fence of at least six feet in height and three
feet in distance from the primary enclosure fence. The enclosures housing the wallaby and kangaroos are surrounded by
the 6 foot perimeter fence on three sides but only by a four foot high fence on the fourth side.
A perimeter fence is necessary to keep out unauthorized animals and persons and to act as a secondary containment
fence if the animals were to get out. The facility shall build a secondary or perimeter fence for the exotic species at least
six feet in height and three feet in distance from the primary enclosure.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.127(d)  Repeat
   
Facilities, outdoor. 
No additional perimeter fencing has been added since the last inspection of the fencing. The facility has hired a fencer to 
do the work but it has not yet been completed. The current enclosure housing the two coatimundi is composed of chain 
link panels on all four sides, top and bottom. It is not enclosed by a perimeter fence of at least six feet in height and three 
feet in distance from the primary enclosure fence. The enclosures housing the wallaby and kangaroos are surrounded by 
the 6 foot perimeter fence on three sides but only by a four foot high fence on the fourth side.  
A perimeter fence is necessary to keep out unauthorized animals and persons and to act as a secondary containment 
fence if the animals were to get out. The facility shall build a secondary or perimeter fence for the exotic species at least 
six feet in height and three feet in distance from the primary enclosure. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
